Class HealthPotion

java.lang.Object
Items.Item
Items.Consumable
Items.HealthPotion
public class HealthPotion extends Consumable
Represents a health potion that can be used to heal a hero. Extends the Consumable class.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    HealthPotion(String name, int healAmount, int cost)
    Constructs a HealthPotion object with the specified name, heal amount, and cost.

  • Constructor Details

    • HealthPotion

      public HealthPotion(String name, int healAmount, int cost)
      Constructs a HealthPotion object with the specified name, heal amount, and cost.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the health potion.
      healAmount - The amount of health restored when used.
      cost - The cost of the health potion.

  • Method Details

    • getStock

      public int getStock()
      Gets the current stock of the health potion.
      Returns:
      The number of potions in stock.

    • setStock

      public void setStock(int stock)
      Sets the stock of the health potion.
      Parameters:
      stock - The new stock amount.

    • use

      public void use(Hero hero)
      Uses the health potion on the specified hero. Restores health up to the hero's maximum HP.
      Specified by:
      use in class Consumable
      Parameters:
      hero - The hero who will use the potion.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the health potion.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A formatted string displaying the potion's name, effect, stock, and cost.
